00015 class adodb_access(adodb_mxodbc.adodb_mxodbc):
00016     databaseType = 'access'
00017     dataProvider = 'mxodbc'
00018     sysDate = "FORMAT(NOW,'yyyy-mm-dd')"
00019     sysTimeStamp = 'NOW'
00020     
00021     def _newcursor(self,rs):
00022         return cursor_access(rs,self)    
00023         
00024 class cursor_access(adodb_mxodbc.cursor_mxodbc):
00025     def __init__(self,rs,conn):
00026         adodb_mxodbc.cursor_mxodbc.__init__(self,rs,conn)
00027         self._rowcount = rs.rowcount
